techmeme.title: Tobiko, which offers a dbt-compatible data transformation service to help teams manage data, raised a $4.5M seed and $17.3M Series A led by Theory Ventures (Frederic Lardinois/TechCrunch)
Sixteen Republican lawmakers accuse Nigeria of taking Binance executive Tigran Gambaryan "hostage" and urge Biden to help secure his release in a June 4 letter (Nduka Orjinmo/Bloomberg)
ASML CFO Roger Dassen says TSMC, Intel, and Samsung will all get its €350M high-NA EUV machines by the end of 2024; the machines can print 8nm lines on chips (Cagan Koc/Bloomberg)
A look at Apple's OpenAI deal, ahead of WWDC; sources say Apple plans to offer AI features as an opt-in service, and is working on LLM-powered robotic devices (Mark Gurman/Bloomberg)
Apple plans to fix another Screen Time bug that let kids visit X-rated websites; two researchers say they reported the bug to Apple in March and August 2021 (Joanna Stern/Wall Street Journal)
